Package io.github.jgame.sprite

Class TextSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jgame.sprite.Sprite
      • io.github.jgame.sprite.TextSprite
  • public class TextSprite
extends Sprite
    TextSprite. Very resource intensive. Avoid if possible. Further optimization is needed.
